languages.text: "Наивная зверушка. Я не буду пачкать об тебя клинки сегодня. Но вот мои подданные... мои подданные с удовольствием развлекутся с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "Наивная зверушка. Я не буду пачкать об тебя клинки сегодня. Но вот мои подданные... мои подданые с удовольствием развлекутся с тобой, мон-кай".

languages.text: "Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you."
languages.original_text: "Наивная зверушка. Я не буду пачкать об тебя клинки сегодня. Но вот мои подданные... мои подданные с удовольствием развлекутся с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "Naive little critter. I won't be soiling my blades in your guts today. My subjects, however... they will be delighted to spend time with you, mon-keigh."
"Naive little critter. I won't be soiling my blades in your guts today. My subjects, however... they will be delighted to spend time with you, mon-keigh."
"Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you, mon-keigh."
"Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you, mon-keigh."
"Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you."

languages.text: «Bestia ingenua. Hoy no mancharé mis hojas con tus entrañas, pero mis súbditos... se divertirán contigo con mucho gusto».
languages.original_text: "Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you."

traits.locale_text: «Bestia ingenua. Hoy no mancharé mis hojas con tus entrañas, pero mis súbditos... se divertirán contigo con mucho gusto, mon-keigh».

languages.text: “我现在不打算用你的内脏弄脏我的利刃，天真又愚蠢的小畜生。至于我的臣民们嘛……他们会很乐意拿你消遣一下的。”
languages.original_text: "Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you."

traits.locale_text: “我现在不打算用你的内脏弄脏我的利刃，天真又愚蠢的小畜生。至于我的臣民们嘛……他们会很乐意拿你消遣一下的，猴子。”

languages.text: 「どこまでも甘いな、お前は。今日はお前の内臓で我が刃を汚すことはしない。しかし、俺の部下たちは別だ…あいつらなら喜んでお前をいたぶるだろう、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: "Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you."

traits.locale_text: 「どこまでも甘いな、お前は。今日はお前の内臓で我が刃を汚すことはしない。しかし、俺の部下たちは別だ…あいつらなら喜んでお前をいたぶるだろう、モン＝ケイ」

languages.text: "Naives kleines Geschöpf. Ich werde meine Klingen heute nicht mit Eurem Blut besudeln. Meine Untertanen jedoch ... sie werden sich gerne mit Euch amüsieren."
languages.original_text: "Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you."

traits.locale_text: "Naives kleines Geschöpf. Ich werde meine Klingen heute nicht mit Eurem Blut besudeln. Meine Untertanen jedoch ... sie werden sich gerne mit Euch amüsieren, Chem-Pan-Sey."

languages.original_text: "Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you."

languages.text: « Petite créature naïve. Vos entrailles ne saliront pas mes lames aujourd'hui. Mes sujets, en revanche, se feront un plaisir de s'amuser avec vous. »
languages.original_text: "Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you."

traits.locale_text: « Petite créature naïve. Vos entrailles ne saliront pas mes lames aujourd'hui. Mes sujets, en revanche, se feront un plaisir de s'amuser avec vous, mon-keigh. »

languages.text: "Naif minik yaratık. Bugün kılıcımı bağırsaklarınla kirletmeyi arzulamıyorum. Ancak tebaam sana ne yapar bilemem."
languages.original_text: "Naive little beast. I won't be soiling my blades with your guts today. My subjects, however... they will gladly amuse themselves with you."

traits.locale_text: "Naif minik yaratık. Bugün kılıcımı bağırsaklarınla kirletmeyi arzulamıyorum. Ancak tebaam sana ne yapar bilemem."
